'''Floaty Splody''' is a consumable Gadget used in the [[Midsummer Island Adventure]] event Part IV: [[Harpastum Bombs Loaded... Blow 'Em Away!]].

==Recipe==
{{Recipe
|type = Crafting
|Flaming Flower Stamen = 1
|Luminescent Spine = 1
|yield = 20
|sort = Flaming Flower Stamen,Luminescent Spine
}}

==Notes==
* Only 99 Floaty Splodies can be held in the player's [[Inventory]].

==Trivia==
* The Floaty Splody bears a similar appearance to one of Klee's possessions, [[Dodoco]].
